title: Citi Handlowy Benefits and Privileges Card with New Features
summary: Warsaw, Poland - The Citi Handlowy Benefits and Privileges Card was designed with the needs of our most demanding clients in mind. Beginning in July 2012, 'Benefits and Privileges Card' holders can enjoy a 10 percent discount when purchasing a new Audi car.
tag-1: Citi Handlowy Benefits and Privileges Card with New Features
tag-2: Warsaw, Poland – The Citi Handlowy Benefits and Privileges Card was designed with the needs of our most demanding clients in mind. Beginning in July 2012, 'Benefits and Privileges Card' holders can enjoy a 10 percent discount when purchasing a new Audi car.
tag-3: "Offering diversity of products and services is the key to success," says Tomasz Daniun, Head of Individual Client Segments at Citi Handlowy. "We want to support our clients on all levels and meet their various business needs. Therefore, we are constantly looking for new partners. We already offer a wide range of non-financial benefits including our A La Carte program, cooperation with DESA Unicum and Harvard Business Review, and discounts for exclusive designer brands. But we are not going to stop here."
tag-4: The Benefits and Privileges Card was launched in September 2011. Cardholders (Citigold Select) may enjoy a special 10 percent discount for brand-new Audi cars in Audi showrooms across Poland. The new benefits of the card include discounts for exclusive designer clothing labels by Maciej Zien and Tomasz Ossolinski and the extender A la Carte program. Cardholders are now entitled to use Executive Lounges at the Gdansk Airport, and the number of free entries has changed for Citigold clients (one free entry per month) and for Citigold Select, two free entries per month or one entry with an accompanying person.

tag-9: Citi Handlowy Citi Handlowy is one of the major financial institutions in Poland and offers, under the Citi Handlowy brand, a broad range of state-of-the-art products in corporate, investment and consumer banking. Through its modern distribution channels and a network of over 149 branches, Bank Handlowy services 20,000 corporate customers and 965,000 individual ones. The Bank's group includes Dom Maklerski Banku Handlowego (brokerage house) and Handlowy Leasing. Being a member of Citi enables the customers of Bank Handlowy access to financial services provided in over 100 countries. Further information is available at www.citihandlowy.pl.
